resources.string: A: WashWise is an application that allows users to order laundry services from their mobile device and have the laundry picked up, washed, folded, and delivered back to their doorstep.
Q: How does the laundry delivery app work?

A: Users can download the app, create an account, schedule a pickup time, and select the laundry services they need. The laundry is then picked up by a delivery person, washed and folded by a professional laundry service, and delivered back to the user\'s doorstep.
Q: What laundry services are available on the app?
A: The laundry services available on the app may vary depending on the provider, but they typically include washing, drying, folding, ironing, and dry cleaning.
Q: How long does it take to get my laundry back?
A: The turnaround time for laundry delivery may vary depending on the provider and the services selected. Typically, the laundry will be picked up and delivered back within 24-48 hours.
Q: What if there\'s a problem with my laundry order?
A: If there\'s an issue with your laundry order, you should contact customer support through the app. We will work with you to resolve the problem and ensure that you\'re satisfied with the service.
Q: Do I need to be home for the laundry pickup and delivery?
A: Yes, we currently don\'t offer no-contact services, so you will have to be home during delivery and collection.
Q: How do I pay for the laundry services?
A: We accept payment through the app, using a credit or debit card. Payment is typically processed after the laundry has been delivered.
